name: Wizards of The Bounce
description:
An entry for GitHub Game Off 2017. Made with Godot <3

Story:

You are a wizard living on a happy planet where everybody is round. One day an evil monster appeared, lowering the gravity and making everyone bounce around wildly. He is now trying to take over the world together with his evil minions and only YOU can stop him.

Try throwing back some projectiles!

Made by Christian, Corinna, Eva, Justus, Kim, Tom
